title: France panorama. [No. 72/06]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The General de Gaulle Memorial - a small-scale model of the projected monument. The gleam of crystal - the Baccarat crystal collection. X-rays - Futura 2000. 2. The sugar industry - the beet and sugar industry and its products. 3. Para-skiing - the La Plagne championships. 4. The arts - the “Air-France and Art” Exhibition at the Galliera Museum.
